name: Tomb Crawler
description:
So what is Tomb Crawler? It's a game I made in college with Unity. It was inspired by my favourite theme in video games; adventure. In this game you will explore an ancient tomb, and find the secret at the end.

I made this game because I wanted to make a dungeon that you could explore and feel immersed in. It doesn't feature a whole lot of gameplay but you can light your way and open doors to new areas. I was more concerned in honing my level design skills with this one. I also tried to keep the art consitant, and played around with a few camera effects.

Controls are as follows:

Use WASD and Mouse to move and look around

Space to jump!
